creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: multi-colored wool chain stitch embroidery; two rows of four squares in pie shapes, diamonds and zig-zag designs; rows of shells divide the panels in half in both directions; clusters of shells at bottom corners and sides; row of shells surround; embroidery applied to tan, gauze-like cotton; edged in red cotton
dimension:
16 x 10 1/2 in. (40.64 x 26.67 cm)
1 1/2 in. (3.81 cm) (object part, shell clusters)
title: Neck Panel from a Hat
